content: This product description is for the Reprocessed ViewFlex Xtra Intracardiac Echocardiography (ICE) Catheter. The catheter is intended for use in adolescent and adult patients to visualize cardiac structures and blood flow within the heart. The device has a 64-element phased array transducer and 4-way steering capabilities, controlled through the handle with two deflection mechanisms. The reprocessed version is identical to the original equipment manufacturer version but has undergone sterilization and processing. The ergonomic handle is designed for single-handed operation with an auto-lock steering mechanism, allowing for easier use. The two deflection mechanisms are intended to allow for optimal viewing in four planes. The catheter is compatible with various ultrasound consoles when used
